import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./FacturacionCliente.css"; import { getEspecialesNameApi } from "../../Api/especiales" import DropdownPedidos from "../../Components/Especiales/DropdownPedidos"; import Select from "react-select"; export default function FacturacionCliente() { const [viewBuffet, setViewBuffet] = useState(false); const options = [ { label: "Hola" } ]; const changeBuffet = (cb1, cb2, cb3, cb4) => { if (cb1.checked || cb2.checked || cb3.checked || cb4.checked) { setViewBuffet(true) } else { setViewBuffet(false) } } const changeReserva = (cb1, llegada, reserva) => { if (cb1.checked && !llegada.disabled && !reserva.disabled) { document.getElementById("llegada").disabled = true; document.getElementById("reserva").disabled = true; } else { document.getElementById("llegada").disabled = false; document.getElementById("reserva").disabled = false; } } window.onload = function () { (async () => { const result = await getEspecialesNameApi(); const v = result.especialidades; console.log(v); })(); } const getPedidosInfo = () => { (async () => { const result = await getEspecialesNameApi(); const v = result.especialidades; for (var i = 0; i < v.length; i++) { const name = v[i]; options.push(name) } console.log(options); console.log(v); })(); return (options); } // const populateDropdown = () => { // let select = document.getElementById("pedidosSilla1"); // let arr = ["A", "B"]; // for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) { // var option = document.createElement("OPTION"); // var txt = document.createTextNode(arr[i]); // option.appendChild(txt); // option.setAttribute("value", arr[i]); // select.insertBefore(option, select.lastChild); // } //} return ( <>
